title: Residence4.7.1.2在哪里可以删除这些信息？
author: oceanhhy
txt_content:
QQ浏览器截屏未命名.png (76.35 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-10-8 20:39 上传

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content: 默认权限看不到这些设置吧，OP权限才能看到全部的权限，有权限设置的命令才会列出来

replies.author: oceanhhy
replies.txt_content:
水煮清娃 发表于 2017-10-10 16:39
默认权限看不到这些设置吧，OP权限才能看到全部的权限，有权限设置的命令才会列出来 ...
并没有给相关权限呢。。。

GroupManager\worlds\world\groups.yml

groups:
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -essentials.ping
    - -essentials.me
    - -essentials.nick
    - -essentials.chat.format
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - -essentials.msg.color
    - -essentials.msg.format
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.build.*
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.motd
    - plots.add
    - plots.auto
    - plots.claim
    - plots.home
    - plots.plot.1
    - plots.remove
    - quickshop.create
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    - scriptblock.interact.use
    - scriptblock.walk.use
    inheritance:
    - g:essentials_builder复制代码

GroupManager\globalgroups.yml

  g:essentials_builder:
    permissions:
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.afk.auto
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.balance
    - essentials.balance.others
    - essentials.balancetop
    - essentials.book
    - essentials.chat.color
    - essentials.chat.format
    - essentials.chat.shout
    - essentials.chat.question
    - essentials.compass
    - essentials.delhome
    - essentials.depth
    - essentials.exp
    - essentials.getpos
    - essentials.hat
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.ignore
    - essentials.itemdb
    - essentials.kit
    - essentials.kits.tools
    - essentials.mail
    - essentials.mail.send
    - essentials.me
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.msg.color
    - essentials.msg.format
    - essentials.nick
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.ping
    - essentials.powertool
    - essentials.powertooltoggle
    - essentials.protect
    - essentials.recipe
    - essentials.seen
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.sethome.bed
    - essentials.sethome.multiple
    - essentials.signs.use.*
    - essentials.signs.create.disposal
    - essentials.signs.create.mail
    - essentials.signs.create.protection
    - essentials.signs.create.trade
    - essentials.signs.break.disposal
    - essentials.signs.break.mail
    - essentials.signs.break.protection
    - essentials.signs.break.trade
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.time
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    - essentials.worth
    - essentials.jail.allow.mail
    - essentials.jail.allow.ping
    - essentials.jail.allow.seen复制代码

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content:
oceanhhy 发表于 2017-10-10 21:21
并没有给相关权限呢。。。

GroupManager\worlds\world\groups.yml
这些权限有可能是你很早以前版本继承下来，但新版本默认没有的。我用的是最新的版本4.7.2.3.一般玩家和管理员使用/res 列出的命令跟你有出入。设置权限不是在权限组，是在领地插件配置里：plugins\Residence\flags.yml  [FlagPermission:后面是选择开启或者禁用的权限]。

参考：
[spoiler]Global:
  Flags:
    Global:
      use: true
      build: true
      ignite: true
      firespread: true
      damage: true
      creeper: true
      tnt: true
      pvp: true
  FlagPermission:
    move: true
    build: true
    place: true
    destroy: true
    use: true
    container: true
    pvp: true
    tp: true
    ignite: true
    firespread: true
    bucket: true
    flow: true
